text: Yadi tara tomara sathe bitarke abatirna haya tabe bale da'o, "ami ebam amara anusaranakarigana allahara prati atnasamarpana karechi." Ara ahale kitabadera ebam niraksaradera bale da'o ye, tomara'o ki atnasamarpana karecha? Takhana yadi tara atnasamarpana kare, tabe sarala patha prapta halo, ara yadi mukha ghuriye neya, tahale tomara dayitba halo sudhu pauche deya. Ara allahara drstite rayeche sakala banda.
